dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously, though, are we just… in a simulation now? Like, I'm honestly asking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously, though, are we just... in a simulation now? Like, I'm honestly asking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes, exactly! Because, um, did you see the market? Like, it levitated?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes, exactly! Because, um, did you see the market? Like, it levitated?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the numbers! 666%? Uh, hello?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the numbers! six hundred sixty six percent? Uh, hello?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the interdimensional portals, though! People are buying portals instead of, like, groceries!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the interdimensional portals, though! People are buying portals instead of, like, groceries!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the Department of Interdimensional Affairs? That’s a real thing now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the Department of Interdimensional Affairs? That's a real thing now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And retail sales collapsed by minus 750 percent! You can’t even do that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And retail sales collapsed by minus seven hundred fifty percent! You can't even do that!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Retail sales jumped by 7.5% in Junehigher than the 5.2% expected, but lower than last months record surge of 17.7%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, you can't! And, uh, gold-based life forms? What is Bank of Atlantis even doing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, you can't! And, uh, gold-based life forms? What is Bank of Atlantis even doing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Or the gravity-defying currency! I, um, I don’t even know what that means!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or the gravity-defying currency! I, um, I don't even know what that means!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Twitter thing, though. Cats ruling? Like, actual, furry, little cats?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Twitter thing, though. Cats ruling? Like, actual, furry, little cats?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shares of social media platform Twitter dropped more than 3% following a massive digital currency scam late on Wednesday: Hackers gained access to dozens of high-profile accounts, including Tesla CEO Elon Musk, former vice president Joe Biden and Microsoft cofounder Bill Gates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That’s the utopian society! And the bubblegum flavored air!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That's the utopian society! And the bubblegum flavored air!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That cured coronavirus! After vaccine news from, like, planet Zz'glorg!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That cured coronavirus! After vaccine news from, like, planet Zz'glorg!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Wednesday, stocks rallied on positive coronavirus vaccine news from Moderna and strong earnings results from Goldman Sachs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: This is, uh, this is just too much, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This is, uh, this is just too much, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Way too much. My brain, it’s just… it’s done.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Way too much. My brain, it's just... it's done.
